item.title: Connectiontypessellers: Changelog
item.description: 2020-11-25 Now it’s possible to load free charges for child and baby pax using the Inventory-X extranet. This feature allows buyers to set, at rate level, free children or babies when Channel Managers are not able to load it from their side. More info.
